title: Adapt Social Post for Platform
description: Convert a social media post to fit different platform requirements and best practices
example_prompt:
Please adapt this post for [Target Platform]. Consider:

1. Character limits
2. Platform-specific features
3. Format conventions
4. Hashtag usage
5. Link formatting
6. Media recommendations
7. Best posting practices

Original Post ([Original Platform]):
[Post Content]

Provide the adapted post with any relevant platform-specific recommendations.
